description.value: Once per game session, character can make +0 Trade (Cook) Test, taking several minutes and with GM Discretion gaining a bonus to the test for acquiring certain ingrediences to enhance the meal. If successful, Squad Members gain +5 to Willpower Tests to resist the effects of Fear and Pinning until the end of the nextencounter. If the character suceeds by 5+ Degrees of Success, the first time each squad member uses a Fate Point before the end of the next encounter, they roll 1d10, on a 10 the Fate Point is Refunded.
